  • Method Details

    • getUserByOidcid

      public Optional<User> getUserByOidcid(String oidcid)
      Retrieves a user by their unique identifier (OIDC ID). Attempts to find the user by their oidcid using the UserRepository.getUserByOidcid(String) method. Returns an Optional containing the user if found, or an empty Optional if not found.
      Specified by:
      getUserByOidcid in interface CommonService
      Parameters:
      oidcid - the unique identifier of the user
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the user if found, or an empty Optional if not found

    • getGraphByUuid

      public Optional<Graph> getGraphByUuid(String uuid)
      Retrieves a graph by its UUID. Attempts to find the graph by its UUID using the GraphRepository.getGraphByUuid(String) method. Returns an Optional containing the graph if found, or an empty Optional if not found.
      Specified by:
      getGraphByUuid in interface CommonService
      Parameters:
      uuid - the UUID of the graph
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the graph if found, or an empty Optional if not found

    • getGraphsByOidcid

      public List<Map<String,Object>> getGraphsByOidcid(String oidcid)
      Retrieves a list of graphs associated with a user by their user identifier (OIDC ID). Checks if the user with the provided oidcid exists using
      the UserRepository.getUserByOidcid(String) method. Throws a NoSuchElementException if the user is not found. Retrieves the list of graphs associated with the user using
      the GraphMapper.getGraphsByOidcid(String) method.
      Specified by:
      getGraphsByOidcid in interface CommonService
      Parameters:
      oidcid - The user identifier.
      Returns:
      A list of maps, where each map represents a graph and contains its details.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - If the user with the specified oidcid is not found.

    • createAndBindGraph

      public Graph createAndBindGraph(GraphCreateDTO graphCreateDTO, org.neo4j.driver.Transaction tx)
      Creates and binds a new graph to a user. Retrieves the title, description, and user identifier from the provided DTO. Generates unique UUIDs for the graph and its relation. Retrieves the current time. Attempts to find the user by the provided user identifier using the getUserByOidcid(String) method. Throws a NoSuchElementException if the user is not found. Creates and binds the graph to the user using
      the GraphMapper.createGraph(String, String, String, String, String, String, Transaction) method.
      Specified by:
      createAndBindGraph in interface CommonService
      Parameters:
      graphCreateDTO - The DTO containing the information for creating the graph.
      It includes the graph title, description, and user identifier.
      tx - The Neo4j transaction object used for the database operation.
      Returns:
      The created Graph object.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - If the user with the specified identifier is not found.
